title: Replace hero section logo with circular emblem image without white background

requirements.text: Replace the current logo in the home page hero section with the uploaded circular emblem image (IMG-20260121-WA0003-1.jpg) — the version without the white background — featuring 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' text in Devanagari script around the top, two deity portraits, crossed swords, and a central sunrise symbol over water waves with gradient orange-yellow background. Save the image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-emblem.png and render it in the hero section.

quotes: Replace the hero section logo with the second image (IMG-20260121-WA0003-1.jpg) — the circular करणी सेना युवा शक्ति emblem without the white background

acceptanceCriteria: The hero section on the home page displays the circular emblem from IMG-20260121-WA0003-1.jpg
The logo image has no white background (transparent or blended with the hero background)
The logo renders correctly on both desktop and mobile viewports
No previous placeholder or old logo is visible in the hero section

constraints: Use IMG-20260121-WA0003-1.jpg (no white background version), not IMG-20260121-WA0003.jpg
nonGoals: Changing any other section of the home page
Modifying the Layout header logo separately

edits: Remove white background to make it fully transparent, preserving the circular emblem shape (IMG-20260121-WA0003-1.jpg > logo-emblem.dim_512x512.png)
